item.title: Making sense of CPU utilization
item.description: A few days back I had the following situation at work: we run a bunch of websockets in containers. These containers store users’ sessions. When something unexpected happens to the websocket, the program makes a select in a database, fetches a few info, and tries to connect again - reviving the websocket. The container runs two programs: a node program and an engine. The two of them connects through a unix socket.
